verses.name: Ezekiel 27:1
verses.text: The word of the Lord came again unto me, saying,

verses.name: Ezekiel 27:2
verses.text: Now, thou son of man, take up a lamentation for Tyrus;

verses.name: Ezekiel 27:3
verses.text: And say unto Tyrus, O thou that art situate at the entry of the sea, which art a merchant of the people for many isles, Thus saith the Lord God; O Tyrus, thou hast said, I am of perfect beauty.

verses.name: Ezekiel 27:4
verses.text: Thy borders are in the midst of the seas, thy builders have perfected thy beauty.

verses.name: Ezekiel 27:5
verses.text: They have made all thy ship boards of fir trees of Senir: they have taken cedars from Lebanon to make masts for thee.
